txt.en: A large, armoured troll has been seen walking amongst the siege weapons overlooking the approach to the hills in the southernmost reaches of Dol Dínen. This great brute leads the trolls who maintain the siege-weapons at Dol Dínen.

A large, armoured troll has been seen walking amongst the siege weapons overlooking the approach to the hills in the southernmost reaches of Dol Dínen. This great brute leads the trolls who maintain the siege-weapons at Dol Dínen.
You have defeated the Siege-master Pakonka

The armoured troll Pakonka can be found within Hîsuk in the shadow of the mountain overlooking the valley of Dol Dínen, far to the south-east of Esteldín.\n\nYou should seek out the armoured captain of the trolls in Dol Dínen. With the death of their captain, the trolls will be thrown into disarray.
You ventured deep into the heart of the Orc-encampment at Dol Dínen and defeated the troll siege-master, Pakonka. His loss will hinder the Orc-army for at least a short while.
You ventured deep into the heart of the Orc-encampment at Dol Dínen and defeated the troll siege-master, Pakonka.
'Use caution and do not think that you can simply assail this foe. He will be amongst the leaders of this invasion and likely well-defended. Use your cunning and numbers to defeat this foe.'
'You have done a great service for the Rangers and the Free Peoples of the North Downs, [placeholder].'
'The Orcs of Dol Dínen will have much to consider before continuing along their destructive path.'

The armoured troll Pakonka can be found within Hîsuk in the shadow of the mountain overlooking the valley of Dol Dínen, far to the south-east of Esteldín.\n\nYou should seek out the armoured captain of the trolls in Dol Dínen. With the death of their captain, the trolls will be thrown into disarray.
